content:
As a language model AI, I don't have access to Fiat's future plans. However, we can make predictions based on their recent activities and statements. 

Fiat has expressed a commitment to transitioning to electric vehicles, and they have already launched the electric version of their iconic 500 model. They also plan to electrify several of their models in the coming years, indicating that they see a future where electric vehicles play a more significant role in the auto industry. 

Additionally, Fiat has been investing in autonomous vehicle technology, suggesting that they see a future where self-driving cars will be a significant part of the industry. They have also been developing partnerships with tech companies to co-create new technologies and expand their reach.

Overall, it seems that Fiat's future plans revolve around developing new technologies and embracing innovation in the auto industry. This approach will likely involve expanding their offerings in electric and autonomous vehicles and continuing to invest in research and development to stay at the forefront of industry developments.
